Name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
Title: Xianyun: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
Source: Reward for inviting Xianyun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1510]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1510] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15102]</color> once.
When you switch characters, this card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Storm Pinion</color> stack. (Max 2 stacks gained per Round)
When your $[A1510], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15101]</color>, consume all <color=#FFFFFFFF>Storm Pinion</color> stacks. Each consumed stack increases DMG dealt by 1.
(You must have $[A1510] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
